PHRASE.LANG:
The Morphsuit™ Bundle for Women contains a great selection of Morphsuits™.
 (1) Morphsuit™ - Slender Man (Women)
 (2) Morphsuit™ - Dracula (Women)
 (3) Morphsuit™ - Werewolf (Women)
 (4) Morphsuit™ - Glow Skeleton (Women)
 (5) Morphsuit™ - Classic Frankenstein (Women)
 (6) Morphsuit™ - Mummy (Women)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Green Witch (Women)
 (8) Morphsuit™ - Skeletonblack (Women) [#Legal]

Le lot pour femme Morphsuit™ contient une magnifique sélection de Morphsuits™.
 
 Ce lot contient :
 (1) Morphsuit™ - Slenderman (femme)
 (2) Morphsuit™ - Dracula (femme)
 (3) Morphsuit™ - Loup-garou (femme)
 (4) Morphsuit™ - Squelette luisant (femme)
 (5) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein classique (femme)
 (6) Morphsuit™ - Momie (femme)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Sorcière écolo (femme)
 (8) Morphsuit™ - Squelette noir (femme) [#Legal]

 Dieses Bündel enthält:
 (1) Morphsuit™ - Slender Man (Damen)
 (2) Morphsuit™ - Dracula (Damen)
 (3) Morphsuit™ - Werwolf (Damen)
 (4) Morphsuit™ - Leucht-Skelett (Damen)
 (5) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein (Damen)
 (6) Morphsuit™ - Mumie (Damen)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Grüne Hexe (Damen)
 (8) Morphsuit™ - Skelettschwarz (Damen) [#Legal]

Il set Morphsuit™ da donna comprende una selezione eccezionale di tute Morphsuit™.
 
 Il set comprende:
 (1) Morphsuit™ - Slender Man (Donna) (2) Morphsuit™ - Dracula (Donna) (3) Morphsuit™ - Lupo mannaro (Donna) (4) Morphsuit™ - Scheletro luminoso (Donna) (5) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein classico (Donna) (6) Morphsuit™ - Mummia (Donna)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Strega verde (Donna)
 (8) Morphsuit™ - Scheletro nero (Donna) [#Legal]

El Pack Morphsuit™ para Mujer contiene una gran selección de Morphsuits™.
 
 Este pack contiene:
 (1) Morphsuit™ - El Gallardo (Mujer) (2) Morphsuit™ - Dracular (Mujer) (3) Morphsuit™ - Hombre Lobo (Mujer) (4) Morphsuit™ - Esqueleto Fosforescente (Mujer) (5) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein Clásico (Mujer) (6) Morphsuit™ - Momia (Mujer)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Bruja Verde (Mujer)
